step: Don't buy take away coffee today
Put the lights out in the rooms you aren't in
Use a reusable water bottle instead of single-use plastic
Turn off electronic devices when not in use
Plant a tree or participate in a tree-planting event
Reduce meat consumption for the day
Use public transportation or carpool instead of driving alone
Recycle paper, plastic, and glass materials
Take shorter showers to conserve water
Participate in a local cleanup event to reduce litter
